name: Cowlor
description:
My second entry to the #1GAM challenge ! (Contains cow sounds !)

We all at one point in our life wanted to be an alien and abduct colorful cows. The wait is now over. Quick the cows are running away :P

Any feedback is more than appreciated :)

Have fun !

- SmallPhil <3
